2.verse: Kunini na, Yehova, ndizibika, ungeva; ndikhala kuwe ndisithi, Ugonyamelo, ungasindisi?

3.verse: Yini na ukuba undikhangelise ubutshinga, ukondele okubi?  Yimbuqo nogonyamelo phambi kwam; kukho ubambano, kuphakame ingxabano.

4.verse: Ngenxa yoko uyekelelwe umyalelo, ukuze kungaveli naphakade okusesikweni; kuba abangendawo bayawarhawula amalungisa; ngenxa yoko okusesikweni kuphuma kujikekile.

5.verse: Khangelani phakathi kweentlanga, nondele, ningakhulumi nokukhuluma; ngokuba ndiya kusebenza umsebenzi ngemihla yenu,  eningayi kukholwa nguwo, nokuba niyawubaliselwa.

6.verse: Kuba, yabonani, ndixhoxha amaKaledi, uhlanga olulugcalagcala, oluyintshakavula; oluhamba nobubanzi behlabathi, ukuze luhluthe amakhaya angewalo.

7.verse: Luyadengisa, luyoyikeka; kuphuma kwakulo okusesikweni kwalo,  nokuphakama kwalo.

8.verse: Anamendu ngaphezu kwezingwe amahashe alo, aqubula ngaphezu kweengcuka zangokuhlwa. Bayaphalisa abamahashe balo; abamahashe balo beza bevela kude, bee tshwebelele njengexhalanga elikhawulezayo ukuza kudla.

9.verse: Bonke bephela beza ngokugonyamela; ubuso babo buzamela phambili; bahlanganisa abathinjwa njengentlabathi.

10.verse: Bona bacukuceza ookumkani, nezidwangube ziyintlekisa kubo;  bona bayazihleka iinqaba zonke; bafumba uthuli, bazithi hlasi.

11.verse: Baya kwandula bakhukule ngokomoya, badlule, bazeke ityala;  la mandla abe nguthixo wabo.

12.verse: Wena akunguye na owasusela kwakumandulo, Yehova, Thixo wam,  ungoyiNgcwele wam? Asiyi kufa. Yehova, ubamisele ukuba bagwebe;  Liwa, ubaseke ukuba bohlwaye.

13.verse: Wena ungomehlo ahlambulukileyo, ukuba angayikhangeli into embi, ukuba ungabi nakukondela okubi; ubondele ngani na ke abanginizi, ukuba uthi cwaka njeongendawo emginya olilungisa kunaye?

14.verse: Ulwenze ke uluntu lwanjengeentlanzi zaselwandle,  njengezinambuzane ezingenamlawuli.

15.verse: Bonke bephela babanyusa ngeqherhu labo; babaqweqwedisa ngomnatha wabo, babahlanganise ngomnathakazi wabo; ngenxa yoko bayavuya, bagcobe.

16.verse: Ngenxa yoko babingelela kumnatha wabo, baqhumisele kumnathakazi wabo; kuba sityebe ngezo zinto isahlulo sabo,  nokudla kwabo kwaba ngamanqatha ngazo.

17.verse: Baya kuwukhuphela na ngenxa yoko umnatha wabo, bahlale bebulala iintlanga, bangacongi na?

1.verse: Ndiya kuma emboniselweni yam, ndizibeke phezu kwenqaba,  ndibonisele, ukuba ndiyibone into aya kuyithetha kum, nento endiya kuphendula yona ngenxa yesimangalo sam.

2.verse: Wandiphendula ke uYehova, wathi, Bhala umbono, uwukrole kakuhle emacwecweni, ukuze abaleke owulesayo.

3.verse: Kuba umbono usaya kuba ngowexesha elimisiweyo, ukhawulezela ekupheleni, angathethi wona amanga; ukuba uthe wazilazila,  wulinde, kuba uya kuza, awuyi kubuya umva.

4.verse: Yabona, ugxalathelene, awuthe tye, umphefumlo wakhe phakathi kwakhe; ke lona ilungisa liya kudla ubomi ngokholo lwalo.

5.verse: Naphezu koko, iwayini ngumtshinizisi, umfo okhukhumeleyo,  akahlali; yena owandisileyo umbilini wakhe njengelabafileyo,  abe enjengokufa, enganeliswa, koko ezihlangani sela kuye iintlanga zonke, azibuthele kuye izizwe zonke.

6.verse: Aziyi kuwenza umzekeliso ngaye yini na, zonke ezo ziphela,  zimkwekwele, zimntsonkothele, zisithi, Uha, lowo wandisa okungekwakhe! (kunini na?) esenjenjalo ezisindanisa ngezibambiso?

7.verse: Abakudlayo abayi kusuka beme ngesiquphe yini na, bavuke abakuqungaqungayo, ube ngamaxhoba kubo?

8.verse: Ekubeni wena ubhunyule iintlanga ezininzi, aya kukubhunyula onke amasalela ezizwe, ngenxa yamagazi oluntu, nangenxa yokuligonyamela kwakho ilizwe, nomzi, nabemi bawo bonke.

9.verse: Yeha, oyizuzela indlu yakhe inzuzo embi, ukuze ayakhele phezulu indlu yakhe, ukuze azihlangule esandleni sobubi!

10.verse: Uyicebele ihlazo indlu yakho, ngokunqamla izizwe ezininzi;  wonile kumphefumlo wakho.

11.verse: Ngokuba ilitye eliseludongeni liya kukhala, nomqadi womthi usabele kulo.

12.verse: Yeha ke, owakha umzi ngamagazi, oqinisa umzi ngobugqwetha!

13.verse: Yabona, akuphumi kuYehova wemikhosi na ukuthi izizwe zizixhamlele umlilo, izizwe zizityhafisele okulambathayo?

14.verse: Kuba ihlabathi liya kuzala kukwazi ubuqaqawuli bukaYehova,  njengamanzi egubungele ulwandle.

15.verse: Yeha, wena useza ummelwane wakho, usongezelela ubushushu bakho kuye, umnxilisa nokumnxilisa, ukuze ubondele ubuze bakhe!

16.verse: Uya kuhluthiswa ngocukucezo, kungabi luzuko; sela nawe,  kubonakale ukungaluki kwakho. Iya kujikela kuwe indebe yesokunene isandla sikaYehova, ucukucezo olukhulu lube phezu kozuko lwakho.

17.verse: Ngokuba ukuyigonyamela kwakho iLebhanon kokugubungela;  nokuchithachitha kwakho iinyamakazi, okwaziqhiphula umbilini;  ngenxa yamagazi oluntu, nangenxa yokuligonyamela kwakho ilizwe,  nomzi, nabemi bawo bonke.

18.verse: Unceda ntoni na umfanekiso oqingqiweyo, ukuba awuqingqe nje umenzi wawo? Unceda ntoni na otyhidiweyo, nomyali wobuxoki,  ukuba umyili wento ayiyilileyo akholose nje ngayo, ukuze enze izinto ezingento, ezizidenge?

19.verse: Uha, kothi emthini, Vuka! athi kwilitye elithe cwaka, Suk  ume! Lingayala na? Nalo, lifakwe egolideni nasesilivereni;  akukho nto ingumoya phakathi kwalo.

20.verse: UYehova ke yena usetempileni yakhe engcwele; malithi tu ebusweni bakhe lonke ihlabathi.

2.verse: Yehova, ndiluvile udaba lwakho, ndoyika; Yehova, wuphilise umsebenzi wakho phakathi kweminyaka, Wazise phakathi kweminyaka; Ekugugumeni kwakho khumbula inceba.

3.verse: UThixo uza evela kwaTeman, OyiNgcwele evela ezintabeni zaseParan. (Phakamisani.) Igubungele amazulu indili yakhe,  Ihlabathi lizele yindumiso yakhe.

4.verse: Ubumhlophe bakhe busuke baba njengokukhanya; Yimithi emacaleni akhe; Kulapho ke ukuzimela kwamandla akhe.

5.verse: Phambi kwakhe kuhamba indyikitya yokufa, Kulandele icesina ezinyaweni zakhe.

6.verse: Umi, walishukumisa ihlabathi; Ukhangele, wazishukumisa iintlanga; Zaba nkumenkume iintaba zanini, Zasibekeka iinduli zasephakadeni; Iindlela zakhe yena zisephakadeni.

7.verse: Ndibone iintente zakwaKushan zisenkathazweni; Amalengalenga elizwe lakwaMidiyan adidizela.

8.verse: Yabe iyimilambo na, Yehova, Yabe iyimilambo, kusini na,  owavutha ngayo na umsindo wakho? Yabe ilulwandle, kusini na,  Owaphuphumela lona umsindo wakho, Ukuze nje ukhwele emahasheni akho, Ezinqwelweni zakho zokusindisa?

9.verse: Sizihlubile sazihluba isaphetha sakho; Zifungelwe ilizwi iintonga zokohlwaya. (Phakamisani.) Ihlabathi uligqobhoza imilambo.

10.verse: Zikubonile, ziyankwantya iintaba, Kudlule isiphango samanzi; Amanzi anzongonzongo akhupha isandi sawo,  Aziphakamisela phezulu izandla zawo.

11.verse: Latshona ilanga nenyanga ekhayeni lazo, Ngokukhanya kweentolo zakho ezihambayo, Ngobumhlophe bokubengezela kwezikhali zakho.

12.verse: Ulinyathela ilizwe ubhavuma, Unyhashe iintlanga unomsindo.  Uphuma ukuba usindise abantu bakho.

13.verse: Ukuba usindise umthanjiswa wakho: Uphaluse intloko endlwini yongendawo, Usihlube isiseko sakhe, ude use entanyeni. (Phakamisani.)

14.verse: Uyihlaba ngeentonga zakhe intloko yezimpi zakhe,  Ezigalelekayo zisiza kundichitha; Ezikuvuyelela kwazo ngathi ziza kudla olusizana entsithelweni.

15.verse: Unyathela ulwandle ngamahashe akho, Isiyaluyalu samanzi amaninzi.

16.verse: Ndithe ndakuva, saxuxuzela isisu sam, Umlomo wam wabebezela seso sithonga; Kwangena impehla emathanjeni am, ndagungqa apho ndimi khona; Ukuba ndilindele imini yembandezelo, Eza ebantwini oya kubangenela.

17.verse: Nokuba umkhiwane awusayi kutyatyamba, Kungabikho ndyebo emidiliyeni; Nokuba isiqhamo somnquma asiyi kuba siso, Amasimi angabi nakudla, Iphele esibayeni impahla emfutshane, Kungabikho nkomo esitalini:

18.verse: Mna ke ndiya kudlamka ndikuYehova, Ndigcobe ndikuThixo umsindisi wam.

19.verse: Ungamandla am uYehova iNkosi; Uzenza iinyawo zam, zibe njengezamaxhamakazi, Andinyathelise emimangweni yam.  Kumongameli owokubethelwa izinto ezineentambo.
